articles.title: Scudetto or Champions League? Much will depend on the recoveries of Pulisic and Leao
articles.summary: Yesterday's victory against Bologna allowed Milan to return to -5 behind league leaders Inter, but for Max Allegri the most important thing is to have extended their lead to fifth place in the standings (+7 over Roma).

articles.summary: Throughout January, AC Milan were looking for a suitor for Christopher Nkunku, and it seems that this may have an effect.  After a disappointing first few months, Milan approached the January mercato seemingly ready to part ways in a situation reminiscent of that involving Alvaro Morata last season.
